actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide a maximum term of supervised release of life for sex offenders.
short_title: Lifetime Consequences for Sex Offenders Act of 2003
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Lifetime Consequences for Sex Offenders Act of 2003 - Amends the Federal criminal code to make any term of years or life the authorized term of supervised release for the offenses of sexual abuse, sexual exploitation of children, transportation for illegal sexual activity (generally), and sex trafficking of children.

titles.title: Lifetime Consequences for Sex Offenders Act of 2003
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide a maximum term of supervised release of life for sex offenders.
